          <title>
            <string language="de">Zerstörung der tropischen Regenwälder</string>
            <string language="en">Destruction of the tropical rainforest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Destruction de la forêt tropicale tropicale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Destruição do mais rainforest tropical</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distruzione del più rainforest tropicale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταστροφή του τροπικού τροπικού δάσους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Destrucción del ma's rainforest tropical</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Weltkarte. Gekennzeichnet sind die Verbreitung der tropischen Regenwälder und gerodete Flächen.</string>
            <string language="en">Map of the World, showing the distribution of tropical rainforests and cleared areas highlighted.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Regenwald</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Tropen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Rodung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rain forest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Tropics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rodung</string>
          </keyword>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carte du monde, montrant la distribution des 
forêts tropicales tropicales et des zones effacées mises en valeur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapa do mundo, mostrando a distribuição de 
rainforests tropicais e das áreas canceladas destacados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il programma del mondo, mostrante la distribuzione
dei rainforests tropicali e delle zone annullate ha evidenziato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτης του κόσμου, που εμφανίζει τη διανομή των 
τροπικών τροπικών δασών και των καθαρισμένων περιοχών που 
τονίζονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Correspondencia del mundo, mostrando la 
distribución de rainforests tropicales y de áreas borradas 
destacados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forêt tropicale</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
